328820.name: Lords of the Fallen™ Artbook
328820.description: Discover the designs of Lords of the Fallen in this unique 96-page Artbook. Each page sheds light on the meticulous process of translating a collage of ideas into the language of the game. Marvel at the concept art of many talented artists that joined together to create everything from breathtaking locations, powerful Rhogar Lords and their sly minions, to detailed armors, weapons and items that aid Harkyn on his journey to face the gravest threat of all – the Fallen God.
328820.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
